original_title: The Good Guys and the Bad Guys
overview: An aging lawman and an aging outlaw join forces when their respective positions in society are usurped by a younger, but incompetent Marshal, and a younger, but vicious gang leader.
tagline: The last of The Wildest Bunch shoots it out with a new breed of gunslinging glory-seekers.
title: The Good Guys and the Bad Guys
